Here is an outline for a blog post about the five categories of needs that Four Tet's music meets, and how other artists can use this insight to set their audience strategy:

I. Introduction

* Introduce the concept of category-related needs and explain how they drive people to seek out music
* Mention Four Tet as an example of an artist who meets a wide range of category-related needs in his music

II. The five categories of needs that Four Tet's music meets

* Emotional needs: Discuss how Four Tet's music helps listeners express and release emotions, enhance their mood, relax, and more
* Psychological needs: Explain how Four Tet's music can be used as a form of escapism, entertainment, or self-expression
* Social and interpersonal needs: Describe how Four Tet's music can facilitate social connection and cultural identity and belonging
* Cognitive and intellectual needs: Elaborate on how Four Tet's music stimulates the mind, promotes intellectual curiosity, and offers novelty and surprise
* Physical and physiological needs: Discuss how Four Tet's music can motivate exercise and support mindfulness and meditation

III. The power of using category-related needs to design music and marketing

* Discuss how understanding and meeting category-related needs in music can help artists connect with their audiences on a deeper level
* Explain how this understanding can also inform marketing strategies and help artists reach and engage their target audiences

IV. How other artists can use this insight into Four Tet's audience to set their own audience strategy

* Suggest ways that other artists can learn from Four Tet's success in meeting a wide range of category-related needs in his music
* Offer tips on how artists can use this insight to identify and understand their own target audiences and design strategies to better engage them

V. Conclusion

* Recap the main points of the blog post and encourage other artists to consider category-related needs when setting their audience strategy

I hope this outline is helpful. Let me know if you have any further questions or need any additional information.
